about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy the story while completing the puzzles.
Connect lines according to the numbers on the squares until all spaces are completed.
After completing the puzzle, you will get a diary of the protagonist's experience.
Collect all diaries to experience the complete story.

Story Background

You discover a door to another world, which leads to another world's tavern.
This pub has beautiful girls of all different races and they are full of lust.
What will happen there?

Characters

Elina:

A half-elf with long blonde hair, green eyes, curvaceous body.
She is the bartender at Eden Bar who has an affinity for humans, with flirtatious and bold personality.

Leina:

She is a half-human, half-demon succubus who has been living in the tavern for over a decade.
Leina's eyes are crimson red with black pupils, making them seem more like those of an animal than human.

Mia:

A 21-year-old drow (dark elf) who hails from an underground civilization.
She is petite with raven black hair that reaches her waist, and eyes so dark they're almost invisible unless you catch them when she looks at you directly into yours.

Features

  • An imaginary fantasy erotic story with heroines who have unique personalities.
  • 20 sexy erotic CGs of heroines.
  • Skip puzzles whenever you want. (Press Enter at puzzle).
  • CG appreciation mode. (Click the CG next to it after completing the puzzle)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
